en.title: **FREE** FIRE
en.text:
Gear up for the ultimate battle in Free Fire, where fast-paced action meets strategic gameplay! Compete in intense battle royale matches, showcase your survival skills, and dominate the battlefield with your squad.

  • Battle it out in BR and CS modes
  • Form a team of 4 players and strategize your way to victory
  • Fair play ensured – No cheats allowed
  • Experience high-paced action with intense firefights

Join now and claim your place among the best Free Fire players!

fr.title: Développeur **Backend Senior**
fr.text:
Dirigeant une équipe de développeurs pour concevoir et mettre en œuvre des solutions backend pour les services d'Apple, en se concentrant sur:

  • Sécurité
  • Scalabilité pour gérer des millions d'utilisateurs dans le monde
  • Développement d'APIs RESTful
  • Optimisation des performances des bases de données avec PostgreSQL
  • Création de services avec Swift, PHP et GraphQL

Ensemble, nous assurons que l'infrastructure backend d'Apple reste robuste et efficace.

ko.title: **수석 백엔드** 개발자
ko.text:
Apple 서비스의 백엔드 솔루션을 설계하고 구현하는 개발 팀을 이끌며, 다음에 중점을 둡니다:

  • 보안
  • 수백만 명의 사용자를 처리할 수 있는 확장성
  • RESTful API 개발
  • PostgreSQL로 데이터베이스 성능 최적화
  • Swift, PHP, GraphQL로 서비스 구축

우리는 함께 Apple의 백엔드 인프라가 견고하고 효율적으로 유지되도록 보장합니다.

en.title: **BG**MI
en.text:
BattleGrounds Mobile India (BGMI) delivers an intense and action-packed battle royale experience.

  • Team up with your squad
  • Plan strategies and adapt
  • Master Classic and Arena battles
  • Survive and claim victory

Only the strongest and most tactical players will dominate the battleground. Are you ready to drop in?

Dirigeant une équipe de développeurs pour concevoir et mettre en œuvre des solutions backend pour les services d'Apple, en se concentrant sur:

ko.text:

en.title: **AMONG US**
en.text:
Work together with your crewmates to complete tasks—but beware! Impostors are lurking among you.

  • Deception and strategy at its finest
  • Find and vote out the impostors
  • Complete tasks before it's too late
  • Play with friends or online

Will you survive the deception, or will the impostors win?

en.title: **SQUID**GAME
en.text:
Compete in a series of intense childhood-inspired games where only the strongest survive.

  • Red Light, Green Light
  • Honeycomb Challenge
  • Tug of War
  • Glass Bridge
  • Final Showdown

Do you have what it takes to survive and claim victory?
